categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A Cerean Jedi archaeologist was a male who was sensitive to the Force and was trained as a Jedi. During the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic, the Jedi archaeologist inspected a set of remains on a world with his lightsaber. The Cerean was light-skinned with gray hair and wore brown Jedi robes. He used a lightsaber with a green crystal.

The Cerean Jedi was depicted on the "Jedi Archaeologist" card for The Price of Victory, an expansion set of cards for the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game. He was illustrated by artist Ryan Barger.
